mapper.insert: insert into parking_lot (PARKING_NAME, ADDR, PARKING_CODE, PARKING_TYPE, PARKING_TYPE_NM, OPERATION_RULE, OPERATION_RULE_NM, TEL, QUE_STATUS, QUE_STATUS_NM, CAPACITY, CUR_PARKING, CUR_PARKING_TIME, PAY_YN, PAY_NM, NIGHT_FREE_OPEN, NIGHT_FREE_OPEN_NM, WEEKDAY_BEGIN_TIME, WEEKDAY_END_TIME, WEEKEND_BEGIN_TIME, WEEKEND_END_TIME, HOLIDAY_BEGIN_TIME, HOLIDAY_END_TIME, SYNC_TIME, SATURDAY_PAY_YN, SATURDAY_PAY_NM, HOLIDAY_PAY_YN, HOLIDAY_PAY_NM, FULLTIME_MONTHLY, GRP_PARKNM, RATES, TIME_RATE, ADD_RATES, ADD_TIME_RATE, BUS_RATES, BUS_TIME_RATE, BUS_ADD_TIME_RATE, BUS_ADD_RATES, DAY_MAXIMUM, LAT, LNG, ASSIGN_CODE, ASSIGN_CODE_NM) values (#{parkingName}, #{addr}, #{parkingCode}, #{parkingType}, #{parkingTypeNm}, #{operationRule}, #{operationRuleNm}, #{tel}, #{queStatus}, #{queStatusNm}, #{capacity}, #{curParking}, #{curParkingTime}, #{payYn}, #{payNm}, #{nightFreeOpen}, #{nightFreeOpenNm}, #{weekdayBeginTime}, #{weekdayEndTime}, #{weekendBeginTime}, #{weekendEndTime}, #{holidayBeginTime}, #{holidayEndTime}, #{syncTime}, #{saturdayPayYn}, #{saturdayPayNm}, #{holidayPayYn}, #{holidayPayNm}, #{fulltimeMonthly}, #{grpParknm}, #{rates}, #{timeRate}, #{addRates}, #{addTimeRate}, #{busRates}, #{busTimeRate}, #{busAddTimeRate}, #{busAddRates}, #{dayMaximum}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{assignCode}, #{assignCodeNm})
mapper.select: select * from parking_lot where ADDR like concat('%', #{addr}, '%')
